title: Welcome to the Office for National Statistics
lede: The UK's largest independent producer official statistics and the recognised national statistical institute of the UK, producing a variety of statistics covering business and industry, the UK economy, employment and the population.

items.name: Trade in goods and services deficit (or surplus)

name: Home

releases.name: Population estimates
releases.description: Annual estimates of the size of the UK usually resident population are calculated at the mid-year point (30 June).

releases.name: Inflation and price indices
releases.description: Inflation measures the rate of increase in prices for goods and services using price indices.

releases.name: Drug use, alcohol and smoking
releases.description: Statistics on drug use, alcohol and smoking focus on deaths and illnesses related to these areas.

highlightedContent.name: What's coming and when?
highlightedContent.description: Find out when our statistics are released and sign-up to receive notifications.

highlightedContent.name: Other official statistics
highlightedContent.description: Find official statistics produced by other government departments.

highlightedContent.name: Looking for local statistics?
highlightedContent.description: A handy guide to let you know where to find local statistics.

highlightedContent.name: Census
highlightedContent.boxText: Who we are. How we live. What we do.
highlightedContent.description: Discover how our census statistics help paint a picture of the nation and how we live.

highlightedContent.name: Visual.ONS
highlightedContent.description: Visual.ONS is a website exploring new approaches to making ONS statistics accessible and relevant to a wide public audience.
